text.content:
Catch your Breath

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Slowed]{Slowed 2} until the end of your next turn.

Melee

Wrong Weapon

If you made a thrown attack, you instead throw an object from your gear (determined randomly by the GM).

Ranged

Got too Close

This attack grants and triggers a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Grapple]{Grapple} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Grab]{Grab} as a reaction by your enemy.

Unarmed

You made 'em Stronger

The target gains a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Effect: +2 status bonus to attack rolls]{+2 status bonus to attack rolls} until the end of its next turn.

Spell
